internationalization.title: Default
internationalization.shortHelp: Set the Default style.

internationalization.title: Default
internationalization.shortHelp: Set the Default style.

internationalization.title: Light
internationalization.shortHelp: Set the Light style.

internationalization.title: Light
internationalization.shortHelp: Set the Light style.

internationalization.title: Measure
internationalization.shortHelp: Set the Measure style.

internationalization.title: Measure
internationalization.shortHelp: Set the Measure style.

internationalization.title: Note
internationalization.shortHelp: Set the Note style.

internationalization.title: Note
internationalization.shortHelp: Set the Note style.

internationalization.title: Validated
internationalization.shortHelp: Set the Validated style.

internationalization.title: Validated
internationalization.shortHelp: Set the Validated style.

internationalization.title: Warning
internationalization.shortHelp: Set the Warning style.

internationalization.title: Warning
internationalization.shortHelp: Set the Warning style.

internationalization.title: Danger
internationalization.shortHelp: Set the Danger style.

internationalization.title: Danger
internationalization.shortHelp: Set the Danger style.

internationalization.title: Close
internationalization.shortHelp: Close all the objects from the view.

internationalization.title: Home
internationalization.shortHelp: Returns to the Home page.

internationalization.title: Information
internationalization.shortHelp: Opens the Information widget, and provides information about the selected objects like their properties (for example, their maturity state or owner).
internationalization.longHelp:
You can edit the properties of the objects from the Properties tab.

Depending on the type of the selected objects, other tabs are available.

internationalization.title: Reveal Documents
internationalization.shortHelp: Displays the attachments and specification documents attached to the objects in the 3D view.

internationalization.title: Relations
internationalization.shortHelp: Opens the Relations widget and displays the ecosystem of related objects.

internationalization.title: Filter
internationalization.shortHelp: Filters the structure either by attribute or by configuration.
internationalization.longHelp: Opens the filter pane where you can define the criteria to filter the structure either by attribute or by configuration.

internationalization.title: Copy Screenshot
internationalization.shortHelp: Take the screenshot of the viewer and copy to the clipboard
internationalization.longHelp: The screenshot only includes the content of the 3D viewer, the panels (such as the layer panel or side panel), and the action bar are not captured.

internationalization.title: Save Screenshot
internationalization.shortHelp: Takes a screenshot of the 3D viewer, and saves it as a .png file.
internationalization.longHelp: The screenshot only includes the content of the 3D viewer, the panels (such as the layer panel or side panel), and the action bar are not captured.

internationalization.title: Print Screenshot
internationalization.shortHelp: Prints the content of the viewer, including selection highlight and loading boxes, to the printer of your choice.

internationalization.title: Volume Query
internationalization.shortHelp: Filters objects in a validated volume (box, sphere, proximity).

internationalization.title: Preferences
internationalization.shortHelp: Lets you set different preferences.
internationalization.longHelp: Select the required check boxes.

internationalization.title: Reframe
internationalization.shortHelp: Fits the entire model in the 3D area.
internationalization.longHelp: The use of the viewer space is simultaneously maximized.

internationalization.title: Pan
internationalization.shortHelp: Moves the model's view horizontally and vertically.
internationalization.longHelp: Click Pan, then drag in any direction.

internationalization.title: Rotate
internationalization.shortHelp: Turns the model around the vertical axis or around the horizontal axis.
internationalization.longHelp: Click Rotate, then drag horizontally or vertically.

internationalization.title: Zoom In or Out
internationalization.shortHelp: Drag up to zoom in, and drag down to zoom out.
internationalization.longHelp: Click the icon again to stop zooming.

internationalization.title: Isometric View
internationalization.shortHelp: Applies standard isometric view.

internationalization.title: Bottom View
internationalization.shortHelp: Applies standard bottom view.

internationalization.title: Top View
internationalization.shortHelp: Applies standard top view.

internationalization.title: Right View
internationalization.shortHelp: Applies standard right view.

internationalization.title: Left View
internationalization.shortHelp: Applies standard left view.

internationalization.title: Back View
internationalization.shortHelp: Applies standard back view.

internationalization.title: Front View
internationalization.shortHelp: Applies standard front view.

internationalization.title: Swap Visible Space
internationalization.shortHelp: Displays objects transferred to the hidden space.
internationalization.longHelp:
All the other elements are not displayed. The background color changes to identify this space.

Click again to switch back to the invisible space.

internationalization.title: View Modes
internationalization.shortHelp: Lets you modify the current view using predefined view modes.
internationalization.longHelp: You can also apply default or predefined appearances to your objects, and change the current ambience.

internationalization.title: Perspective
internationalization.shortHelp: Displays objects in a perspective view.

internationalization.title: Parallel
internationalization.shortHelp: Displays objects in a parallel view.

internationalization.title: Hide/Show Lines
internationalization.shortHelp: Hides or shows the lines.

internationalization.title: Hide/Show Reference Axis
internationalization.shortHelp: Hides or shows the reference axis lines.

internationalization.title: Hide/Show Points
internationalization.shortHelp: Hides or shows the points.

internationalization.title: Pure White
internationalization.shortHelp: Applies the Pure White ambience.
internationalization.longHelp: This ambience contains a ground, a shadow, and a mirror effect.

internationalization.title: Pure White
internationalization.shortHelp: Applies the Pure White ambience.
internationalization.longHelp: This ambience contains a ground, a shadow, and a mirror effect. This is the default ambience.

internationalization.title: White Mirror
internationalization.shortHelp: Applies the White Mirror ambience.
internationalization.longHelp: This ambience contains a white ground, a shadow, and a mirror effect.

internationalization.title: White Review
internationalization.shortHelp: Applies the White Review ambience.
internationalization.longHelp: This ambience contains a ground, a shadow, and no mirror effect.

internationalization.title: White Experience
internationalization.shortHelp: Applies the White Experience ambience. This is the default ambience.
internationalization.longHelp:
This ambience contains a ground, a shadow, and a mirror effect. It also has a background (with a cool area, a warm area, and 2 neon lights).

IBL (Image-based Lighting) is activated with a result similar to the background but with more details and contrast.

internationalization.title: Studio
internationalization.shortHelp: Applies the Studio ambience.
internationalization.longHelp:
This ambience contains a ground, a shadow, and a mirror effect.

It is very similar to the White Mirror ambience. The main differences are the reflection map which is more adapted to the review, and the two light sources illuminating the scene (the first one has a warm color in contrast with the second one which has a cool color).

internationalization.title: Dark Mirror
internationalization.shortHelp: Applies the Dark Mirror ambience.
internationalization.longHelp: This ambience contains a ground, a shadow, a mirror effect, and two light sources coincident with the neons which enables to cast shadows on the ground.

internationalization.title: Dark Review
internationalization.shortHelp: Applies the Dark Review ambience.
internationalization.longHelp: This ambience contains a ground and has no mirror effect.

internationalization.title: White Design
internationalization.shortHelp: Applies the White Design ambience.
internationalization.longHelp: This ambience provides a grid, a ground, a sky, a skyline, and has no shadow.

internationalization.title: Blue Design
internationalization.shortHelp: Applies the Blue Design ambience.
internationalization.longHelp: This ambience provides a grid, a ground, a sky, a skyline, and no shadow.

internationalization.title: Dark Design
internationalization.shortHelp: Applies the Dark Design ambience.
internationalization.longHelp: This ambience contains a grid, a ground, a sky, a skyline and has no shadow.

internationalization.title: Indoor
internationalization.shortHelp: Applies the Indoor ambience.
internationalization.longHelp: This ambience contains a ground shadow, three light sources, and a fuzzy mirror effect.

internationalization.title: City
internationalization.shortHelp: Applies the City ambience.
internationalization.longHelp: This ambience contains one light source, a ground shadow, and inter-object shadows.

internationalization.title: Road
internationalization.shortHelp: Applies the Road ambience.
internationalization.longHelp: This ambience contains one light source, a ground shadow, and inter-object shadows.

internationalization.title: Outdoor
internationalization.shortHelp: Applies the Outdoor ambience.
internationalization.longHelp:
This ambience contains a sky, a ground, and inter-object shadows.

As for review ambiences, it uses the SSAO lighting technique.

internationalization.title: Basic
internationalization.shortHelp: No ambience is defined.
internationalization.longHelp: A neutral environment is applied.

internationalization.title: Visual Quality
internationalization.shortHelp: Lets you modify the rendering performance and the visualization quality.
internationalization.longHelp: You can use presets, or customize some visualization parameters through a dedicated editor.

internationalization.title: Colorize according to LAS classification
internationalization.shortHelp: Lets you colorize the point cloud according to the LAS classification of the data, such as vegetation, buildings, or water bodies.
internationalization.longHelp: The data is colorized with the default class colors. You can change theses colors and hide the classes.

internationalization.title: Colorize according to coordinates
internationalization.shortHelp: Lets you colorize the point cloud with a gradient along the chosen axis.
internationalization.longHelp:
By default, the data is colorized along the Z axis with the default gradient color. You can change the following elements:
  • The axis
  • The color of the gradient
  • The boundaries of the gradient
  • The weight of the minimum and maximum color

internationalization.title: Edit Clipping
internationalization.shortHelp: Lets you edit the clipping definition.
internationalization.longHelp: In the context toolbar, choose options to customize the section (clipping definition, rezise, position, orientation, viewPoint etc.).

internationalization.title: Measure
internationalization.shortHelp: Measures different parameters of an object as well as parameters between two objects.
internationalization.longHelp:
1. Select the geometry types in filters.
  2. Click the objects required for the measurement.
  3. Click Repeat to measure multiple objects in succession.

internationalization.title: Measure
internationalization.shortHelp: Measures objects or the distance between objects.
internationalization.longHelp:
1. Click the objects required for the measurement.
  2. Click Repeat to measure multiple objects in succession.

internationalization.title: Measure
internationalization.shortHelp: Allows to measure position, length, area, volume...

internationalization.title: Measure Thickness
internationalization.shortHelp: Measures the thickness of an object.
internationalization.longHelp:
1. Click the surface of the item to measure its thickness.
  2. Hovering over surfaces displays a preview of items' thickness, and highlights the surfaces involved in the measurement.

internationalization.title: Graphic Properties
internationalization.shortHelp: Change the graphic properties of the selected markers, measures and sections

internationalization.title: Edit Grid
internationalization.shortHelp: Enables modification of grid bounding box

internationalization.title: Create Interference Simulation
internationalization.shortHelp: Creates interference simulation.

internationalization.title: Interference Specifications
internationalization.shortHelp: Edits the specifications defined for the interference simulation.

internationalization.title: Slide
internationalization.shortHelp: Captures a specific state of the markup, sections, measurements, annotations, etc.
internationalization.longHelp: Whenever you create a new slide, the current viewpoint is copied in the new slide.

internationalization.title: Format
internationalization.shortHelp: Captures a specific state of the markup, displaying sections, measurements, annotations, etc.
internationalization.longHelp:
1. Add the required markup features.
  2. Exit the format edition mode.

internationalization.title: Formats
internationalization.shortHelp: Opens the format edit mode.
internationalization.longHelp: If there is no format created in the loaded markup, a new format is created.

internationalization.title: Edit Format
internationalization.shortHelp: Edit the format associated to the slide

internationalization.title: Format...
internationalization.shortHelp: Associate a format to a slide

internationalization.title: Exit Formats
internationalization.shortHelp: Exits from the format edit mode. This command is only available in the format edit mode.

internationalization.title: Update Viewpoint
internationalization.shortHelp: Updates the viewpoint of the slide

internationalization.title: Set as preview
internationalization.shortHelp: Sets the selected slide as preview.

internationalization.title: Reply
internationalization.shortHelp: Creates a slide reply.

internationalization.title: Markup
internationalization.shortHelp: Creates a markup linked to the loaded context. If several contexts are loaded in the session, select one in the Markup dialog box.
internationalization.longHelp: In the Markup dialog box, select a context (if required) and enter a name and description for the markup.

internationalization.title: Export as PDF
internationalization.shortHelp: Exports the markups created on documents along with the annotations and comments to a PDF.
internationalization.longHelp:
A PDF document is downloaded in the selected destination folder.

This PDF has the same size and orientation as the document on which the markup was created.

You can edit the comments and annotations using other PDF applications after the export.

internationalization.title: Rename
internationalization.shortHelp: Updates the name of a markup

internationalization.title: Arrow
internationalization.shortHelp: Creates an arrow to draw attention to a particular part or portion of the context.
internationalization.longHelp:
1. Click an object in the 3D area to position the tip of the arrow.
  2. Define the orientation and size. To position its anchor point precisely, drag the arrow.
  3. Customize the graphic properties of the arrow.

internationalization.title: Circle
internationalization.shortHelp: Circles items to draw attention to a particular part or portion of the context.
internationalization.longHelp:
1. Click an object in the 3D area to position the center of the circle.
  2. Drag the manipulator on the circle's border to re-size it, and move its center point to reposition it.
  3. Customize the graphic properties of the circle.

internationalization.title: Rectangle
internationalization.shortHelp: Creates a rectangle enclosing selected items to draw attention to a particular part or portion of the context.
internationalization.longHelp:
1. Click an object in the 3D area to position the center of the rectangle.
  2. Drag the manipulator on the rectangles border to re-size it, and move its center point to reposition it.
  3. Customize the graphic properties of the rectangle.

internationalization.title: Cloud
internationalization.shortHelp: Creates a freehand annotation to draw attention to a particular part or portion of the context.
internationalization.longHelp:
1. Click an object in the 3D area to start the drawing.
  2. Drag the manipulator on the container's border to re-size it, and move its center point to reposition it.
  3. Customize the graphic properties of the marker.

internationalization.title: Freehand
internationalization.shortHelp: Creates a freehand annotation to draw attention to a particular part or portion of the context.
internationalization.longHelp:
1. Click an object in the 3D area to start the drawing.
  2. Drag the manipulator on the container's border to re-size it, and move its center point to reposition it.
  3. Customize the graphic properties of the marker.

internationalization.title: Text
internationalization.shortHelp: Adds text, linked to a particular part or portion of the context. This marker changes its position according to the changes in the viewpoint.
internationalization.longHelp:
1. Click an object in the 3D area.
  2. Edit the text as required.
  3. Drag the annotation to position it precisely.
  4. Customize the annotation using the contextual commands.

internationalization.title: 2D Text
internationalization.shortHelp: Adds a text marker that is not linked to any object. This marker does not change its position according to the changes in the viewpoint.
internationalization.longHelp:
1. Click an object in the 3D area.
  2. Edit the text as required.
  3. Drag the annotation to position it precisely.
  4. Customize the annotation using the contextual commands.

internationalization.title: Picture
internationalization.shortHelp: Inserts a picture, linked to a particular part or portion of the context. This marker changes its position according to the changes in the viewpoint.
internationalization.longHelp:
1. Click to position the anchor point of the picture, and then either take a picture or browse to select an existing picture.
  2. Use the manipulators and the context toolbar to customize the position and appearance of this annotation.

internationalization.title: 2D Picture
internationalization.shortHelp: Inserts a picture that is not linked to any object. This marker does not change its position according to the changes in the viewpoint.
internationalization.longHelp:
1. Click to position the anchor point of the picture, and then either take a picture or browse to select an existing picture.
  2. Use the manipulators and the context toolbar to customize the position and appearance of this annotation.

internationalization.title: Default
internationalization.shortHelp: Set the Default style.

internationalization.title: Light
internationalization.shortHelp: Set the Light style.

internationalization.title: Measure
internationalization.shortHelp: Set the Measure style.

internationalization.title: Note
internationalization.shortHelp: Set the Note style.

internationalization.title: Validated
internationalization.shortHelp: Set the Validated style.

internationalization.title: Warning
internationalization.shortHelp: Set the Warning style.

internationalization.title: Danger
internationalization.shortHelp: Set the Danger style.

internationalization.title: Default
internationalization.shortHelp: Set the Default style.

internationalization.title: Light
internationalization.shortHelp: Set the Light style.

internationalization.title: Measure
internationalization.shortHelp: Set the Measure style.

internationalization.title: Note
internationalization.shortHelp: Set the Note style.

internationalization.title: Validated
internationalization.shortHelp: Set the Validated style.

internationalization.title: Warning
internationalization.shortHelp: Set the Warning style.

internationalization.title: Danger
internationalization.shortHelp: Set the Danger style.

internationalization.title: Default
internationalization.shortHelp: Set the Default style.

internationalization.title: Light
internationalization.shortHelp: Set the Light style.

internationalization.title: Measure
internationalization.shortHelp: Set the Measure style.

internationalization.title: Note
internationalization.shortHelp: Set the Note style.

internationalization.title: Validated
internationalization.shortHelp: Set the Validated style.

internationalization.title: Warning
internationalization.shortHelp: Set the Warning style.

internationalization.title: Danger
internationalization.shortHelp: Set the Danger style.

internationalization.title: Decrease Font
internationalization.shortHelp: Decrease Font Size.

internationalization.title: Increase Font
internationalization.shortHelp: Increase Font size.

internationalization.title: Display/Hide additional information
internationalization.shortHelp: Display or Hide picture name and creation date.

internationalization.title: 3D Compare
internationalization.shortHelp: Compares two products by showing their differences.
internationalization.longHelp:
Select a first product (considered as new) and a second product (considered as old).

You can use the level selector to select from another level of the product structure.

internationalization.title: 2D Compare
internationalization.shortHelp: Compares two drawings or layouts by showing their differences.
internationalization.longHelp: Select the drawing or layout from the database to perform the comparison

internationalization.title: Copy
internationalization.shortHelp: Copies the selected elements to the clipboard.

internationalization.title: Cut
internationalization.shortHelp: Copies the selected elements to the clipboard and removes them from their original parent feature.

internationalization.title: Paste
internationalization.shortHelp: Duplicates all the features available on the clipboard.

internationalization.title: Paste Special
internationalization.shortHelp: Duplicates all the features of the selected feature types, available on the clipboard. This command is only available for slides and formats.
internationalization.longHelp: Select the feature types.

internationalization.title: Delete
internationalization.shortHelp: Delete the selected elements.

internationalization.title: Navigate On Implementation Links
internationalization.shortHelp: Navigates and focus on the elements pointed by an implementation link of the selected object.

internationalization.title: Hide/Show
internationalization.shortHelp: Hide or Show the selected occurrences.

internationalization.title: Color / Opacity
internationalization.shortHelp: Change the Color and Opacity of the selected occurrences.

internationalization.title: Move
internationalization.shortHelp: Overload part positions

internationalization.title: Remove Overload
internationalization.shortHelp: Remove Overloads of the selected occurrences.

internationalization.title: Focus On
internationalization.shortHelp: Focus on the selected objects.

internationalization.title: Normal View
internationalization.shortHelp: Modifies the viewpoint so that the sight direction is normal to the surface at the selection point.
internationalization.longHelp: Select a surface in the 3D area.

internationalization.title: Reset To Local Coordinates
internationalization.shortHelp: Resets position of the selected object to the local coordinates

internationalization.title: Level selector
internationalization.shortHelp: Displays a level selector to change the robot orientation

internationalization.title: Level Selector
internationalization.shortHelp: Displays a level selector to change the selection and the move level

internationalization.title: Level Selector
internationalization.shortHelp: Display the level selector.

internationalization.title: Hide
internationalization.shortHelp: Hide selected annotations or annotations associated to the selected object.

internationalization.title: Show
internationalization.shortHelp: Display selected annotations or annotations associated to the selected object.

internationalization.title: Hide Annotation set
internationalization.shortHelp: Hide selected annotation set.

internationalization.title: Show Annotation set
internationalization.shortHelp: Display selected annotation set.

internationalization.title: Open in Favorite Context
internationalization.shortHelp: Open the selected 3DShape in Favorite Context.

internationalization.title: Show Geometrical Attachement
internationalization.shortHelp: Display all missing annotations between the selected annotation and the toleranced surface.

internationalization.title: Show related Annotations
internationalization.shortHelp: Display annotations linked to the selected surface.

internationalization.title: Preferences
internationalization.shortHelp: Lets you set different preferences.
internationalization.longHelp: Select the required check boxes.

internationalization.title: Generate Issue
internationalization.shortHelp: Lets you generate an issue.

internationalization.title: Generate Issue from Template
internationalization.shortHelp: Lets you generate an issue from template.

internationalization.title: Generate Change Action
internationalization.shortHelp: Lets you generate a change action.

internationalization.title: Copy Screenshot
internationalization.shortHelp: Take the screenshot of the viewer and copy to the clipboard
internationalization.longHelp: The screenshot only includes the content of the 3D viewer, the panels (such as the layer panel or side panel), and the action bar are not captured.

internationalization.title: Display Root List
internationalization.shortHelp: Hides or shows the list of root objects in the left navigation pane.
internationalization.longHelp:
To remove a root, click the close icon.

To cross-highlight, select the root in the side panel. The same root is selected in the 3D.

internationalization.title: Display Root List
internationalization.shortHelp: Hides or shows the list of root objects in the left navigation pane.
internationalization.longHelp:
To remove a root, click the close icon.

To cross-highlight, select the root in the side panel. The same root is selected in the 3D.

internationalization.title: Information
internationalization.shortHelp: Displays information about the selected object in different tabs in a side pane.
internationalization.longHelp: The available tabs depend on the app they are launched from, and the type of object that is selected.

internationalization.title: Information
internationalization.shortHelp: Displays information about the selected object in different tabs in a side pane.
internationalization.longHelp: The available tabs depend on the app they are launched from, and the type of object that is selected.

internationalization.title: Show/Hide Timeline View
internationalization.shortHelp: Displays or hides the timeline in the view.

internationalization.title: Show/Hide Timeline View
internationalization.shortHelp: Displays or hides the timeline in the view.

internationalization.title: Toggle Photo 360 Mode
internationalization.shortHelp: Activates or deactivates the Photo 360 mode.

internationalization.title: Toggle Photo 360 Mode
internationalization.shortHelp: Activates or deactivates the Photo 360 mode.

internationalization.title: Show/Hide Minimap
internationalization.shortHelp: Displays or hides the Minimap panel.
internationalization.longHelp: The map inside the Minimap panel shows the location state environment to help you locate yourself.

internationalization.title: Show/Hide Minimap
internationalization.shortHelp: Displays or hides the Minimap panel.
internationalization.longHelp: The map inside the Minimap panel shows the location state environment to help you locate yourself.

internationalization.title: Fly/Walk Navigation
internationalization.shortHelp: Lets you navigate your scene in Fly or Walk mode.
internationalization.longHelp: Touch and non-touch devices are supported in both Fly and Walk modes. You can use the mouse (on non-touch devices), the context toolbar, or the keyboard.

internationalization.title: Fly/Walk Navigation
internationalization.shortHelp: Lets you navigate your scene in Fly or Walk mode.
internationalization.longHelp: Touch and non-touch devices are supported in both Fly and Walk modes. You can use the mouse (on non-touch devices), the context toolbar, or the keyboard.

internationalization.title: Activate Clipping
internationalization.shortHelp: To activate the clipping of the objects in 3D Area
internationalization.longHelp: Toggles the visibility of the objects outside of the defined Region of Interest (ROI). The ROI is defined with the help of planes called clipping planes

internationalization.title: Activate Clipping
internationalization.shortHelp: To deactivate the clipping of the objects in 3D Area
internationalization.longHelp: Toggles the visibility of the objects outside of the defined Region of Interest (ROI). The ROI is defined with the help of planes called clipping planes

internationalization.title: Automatic Grid Size
internationalization.shortHelp: Fits the grid to associated root 3D bounding box

internationalization.title: Automatic Grid Size
internationalization.shortHelp: Fits the grid to associated root 3D bounding box

internationalization.title: Automatic Grid Origin
internationalization.shortHelp: Computes grid origin according to current viewpoint

internationalization.title: Automatic Grid Origin
internationalization.shortHelp: Computes grid origin according to current viewpoint

internationalization.title: 3D Grid
internationalization.shortHelp: Displays a 3D grid

internationalization.title: 3D Grid
internationalization.shortHelp: Displays a 3D grid

internationalization.title: Reveal Related Data
internationalization.shortHelp: Reveals Drawings and 2D Layouts related to selected geometry

internationalization.title: Reveal Related Data
internationalization.shortHelp: Reveals Drawings and 2D Layouts related to selected geometry

internationalization.title: Analyze Interferences
internationalization.shortHelp: Lets you visualize the interferences in the product and modify the interference attributes.

internationalization.title: Analyze Interferences
internationalization.shortHelp: Lets you visualize the interferences in the product and modify the interference attributes.

internationalization.title: Display Clash Curve
internationalization.shortHelp: Displays clash curves of the selected interference.
internationalization.longHelp: Activate the command and select the interference from the interference result list.

internationalization.title: Display Clash Curve
internationalization.shortHelp: Displays clash curves of the selected interference.
internationalization.longHelp: Activate the command and select the interference from the interference result list.

internationalization.title: Display Contact Curve
internationalization.shortHelp: Displays Contact curves of the selected interference.
internationalization.longHelp: Activate the command and select the interference from the interference result list.

internationalization.title: Display Contact Curve
internationalization.shortHelp: Displays Contact curves of the selected interference.
internationalization.longHelp: Activate the command and select the interference from the interference result list.

internationalization.title: Display Clearance Curve
internationalization.shortHelp: Displays Clearance curves of the selected interference.
internationalization.longHelp: Activate the command and select the interference from the interference result list.

internationalization.title: Display Clearance Curve
internationalization.shortHelp: Displays Clearance curves of the selected interference.
internationalization.longHelp: Activate the command and select the interference from the interference result list.

internationalization.title: Display Quantifiers
internationalization.shortHelp: Displays Quantifiers of the selected interference.
internationalization.longHelp: Activate the command and select the interference from the interference result list.

internationalization.title: Display Quantifiers
internationalization.shortHelp: Displays Quantifiers of the selected interference.
internationalization.longHelp: Activate the command and select the interference from the interference result list.

internationalization.title: Zoom on Interference
internationalization.shortHelp: Zoom on interference of the selected interference.
internationalization.longHelp: Activate the command and select the interference from the interference result list.

internationalization.title: Zoom on Interference
internationalization.shortHelp: Zoom on interference of the selected interference.
internationalization.longHelp: Activate the command and select the interference from the interference result list.

internationalization.title: Apply Transparency
internationalization.shortHelp: Apply Transparency of the selected interference.
internationalization.longHelp: Activate the command and select the interference from the interference result list.

internationalization.title: Apply Transparency
internationalization.shortHelp: Apply Transparency of the selected interference.
internationalization.longHelp: Activate the command and select the interference from the interference result list.

internationalization.title: Color Overload
internationalization.shortHelp: Applies colors to interfering parts of the selected interference.
internationalization.longHelp: Activate the command and select the interference from the interference result list.

internationalization.title: Color Overload
internationalization.shortHelp: Applies colors to interfering parts of the selected interference.
internationalization.longHelp: Activate the command and select the interference from the interference result list.

internationalization.title: Show feature additional information
internationalization.shortHelp: Display additional information of the selected features.

internationalization.title: Show feature additional information
internationalization.shortHelp: Display additional information of the selected features.

internationalization.title: Annotation Sets Filter
internationalization.shortHelp: Displays or hides the Annotation Sets filter panel.
internationalization.longHelp: You can filter the annotation sets, annotations displayed in the 3D area, and the technological attributes.

internationalization.title: Annotation Sets Filter
internationalization.shortHelp: Displays or hides the Annotation Sets filter panel.
internationalization.longHelp: You can filter the annotation sets, annotations displayed in the 3D area, and the technological attributes.

internationalization.title: 3D Annotations
internationalization.shortHelp: Displays the thumbnails of views and captures in the <wintitle>Views and Captures</wintitle> panel.
internationalization.longHelp: Select the thumbnail of a view or a capture to activate it.

internationalization.title: 3D Annotations
internationalization.shortHelp: Displays the thumbnails of views and captures in the <wintitle>Views and Captures</wintitle> panel.
internationalization.longHelp: Select the thumbnail of a view or a capture to activate it.

internationalization.title: Attributes
internationalization.shortHelp: Displays or hides the Attributes panel.
internationalization.longHelp: You can display annotations and features exposing different types of attributes, such as electrical attributes, knowledge attributes, etc.

internationalization.title: Attributes
internationalization.shortHelp: Displays or hides the Attributes panel.
internationalization.longHelp: You can display annotations and features exposing different types of attributes, such as electrical attributes, knowledge attributes, etc.

internationalization.title: Annotation Blanking
internationalization.shortHelp: Applies blanking to annotations when blanking mode property is 'Area Fill' or 'Area Fill with Geometry'

internationalization.title: Annotation Blanking
internationalization.shortHelp: Applies blanking to annotations when blanking mode property is 'Area Fill' or 'Area Fill with Geometry'
